title: iPSW(2L)-PseKNC: A two-layer predictor for identifying promoters and their strength by hybrid features via pseudo K-tuple nucleotide composition.

tldr.text: A new two-layer predictor, called "iPSW(2L)-PseKNC", was developed by fusing the physicochemical properties of nucleotides and their nucleotide density into PseKNC (pseudo K-tuple nucleotide composition), which is remarkably superior to the existing state-of-the-art predictors in identifying the promoters and non-promoters.
